button.heading: Button
button.subheading: A Button indicates a possible user action.

icon.title: Icon
icon.description: A button can be made of only an icon.

color.title: Color
color.description: A button can be formatted to show different levels of emphasis.

basic.title: Basic
basic.description: The basic button has a subtle appearance.

disabled.title: Disabled
disabled.description: A button can show it is currently unable to be interacted with.

loading.title: Loading
loading.description: A button can show a loading indicator.

group.title: Group
group.description: Buttons can exist together as a group.

typography.heading: Typography
typography.subheading: A Text displays words and characters at various sizes.

color.title: Color
color.description: A typography can have different colors.

input.heading: Input
input.subheading: A input lets users enter and edit text.

disabled.title: Disabled
disabled.description: An input field can show that it is disabled.

labeled.title: Labeld
labeled.description: An input can be formatted with a label.

adornment.title: Adornment
adornment.description: This can be used to add a prefix, a suffix or an action to an element.

icon.title: Icon
icon.description: An input can be formatted with an icon.

error.title: Error
error.description: An input field can show that the data contains errors.

image.heading: Image
image.subheading: An image is a graphic representation of something.

percentage.title: Percentage
percentage.description: A image width can be set by a percentage of its container width.

bordered.title: Bodered
bordered.description: An image may include a border to emphasize the edges of white or transparent content.

centered.title: Centered
centered.description: An image can appear centered in a content block.

lazy.title: Lazy
lazy.description: An image can be loaded lazily.

progressive.title: Progressive
progressive.description: An image can be loaded progressively.

autoHeight.title: Auto Height
autoHeight.description: Automatically set the image height to the image dimension which fits the provided width.

spacer.heading: Spacer
spacer.subheading: A Spacer that adds space between elements.

spacer.title: Spacer
spacer.description: A standard Spacer that may add spaces both horizontally and vertically between elements.

axis.title: Axis
axis.description: A Spacer may add space only to the specific axis.

icon.heading: Icon
icon.subheading: An icon is a glyph used to represent something else.

size.title: Size
size.description: An icon can vary in size.

color.title: Color
color.description: An icon can be formatted with different colors.

inverted.title: Inverted
inverted.description: An icon can have its colors inverted for contrast.

slider.heading: Slider
slider.subheading: A slider allows a user to select a value from a small set of options, often binary.

color.title: Color
color.description: A slider can be filled with different colors.

disabled.title: Disabled
disabled.description: A slider can be read-only and unable to change states.

collapse.heading: Collapse
collapse.subheading: A Collapse expands and collapses its children.

comment.heading: Comment
comment.subheading: A comment displays user feedback to site content.

collapsed.title: Collapsed
collapsed.description: Comments can be collapsed, or hidden from view.

active.title: Active
active.description: A item can show it is currently the active user selection.

swipeable.title: Swipeable
swipeable.description: A list can be swipeable to reveal hidden items.

divided.title: Divided
divided.description: A list can show divisions between content.

padded.title: Padded
padded.description: A list can relax its padding to provide more negative space.

collapse.title: Collapse
collapse.description: A list can collapse its items.

verticalAlign.title: Vertical Align
verticalAlign.description: A list may align its items vertically.

ripple.title: Ripple
ripple.description: Ripple effect upon clicking an item may be turned on and off.

badge.heading: Badge
badge.subheading: Badge generates a small badge to corner of its child.

color.title: Color
color.description: A badge can vary in color.

direction.title: Direction
direction.description: A badge can appear to all corners.

overlap.title: Overlap
overlap.description: Wrapped shape the badge should overlap.

overlapColor.title: Overlap Color
overlapColor.description: The background color of the overlap.

icon.title: Icon
icon.description: A chip can include an icon

image.title: Image
image.description: A chip can include an image

outlined.title: Outlined
outlined.description: A chip can reduce its complexity

color.title: Color
color.description: A chip can have different colors

size.title: Size
size.description: A label can be small or large

row.heading: Row
row.subheading: A row displays content in a row.

box.heading: Box
box.subheading: The Box component serves as a wrapper component for most of the style utility needs.

avatar.heading: Avatar
avatar.subheading: Avatar represent a user and can contain photos, icons, or even text.

group.title: Group
group.description: AvatarGroup renders its children as a stack.

tooltip.heading: Tooltip
tooltip.subheading: A Tooltip displays additional information on top of a page.

tooltip.title: Tooltip
tooltip.description: An element can specify popup content to appear.

speeddial.heading: SpeedDial
speeddial.subheading: A floating action button can display actions in the form of a speed dial.

sheet.heading: Sheet
sheet.subheading: Overlay Modal that displays content from either the bottom or top of the screen.

tab.heading: Tab
tab.subheading: A Tab is a hidden section of content activated by a Menu.

currencyinput.heading: CurrencyInput
currencyinput.subheading: A CurrencyInput allows an easy input of currency formatted numbers.

checkbox.heading: CheckBox
checkbox.subheading: A checkbox allows a user to select a value from a small set of options, often binary.

parallax.heading: Parallax
parallax.subheading: A parallax allows a user to maximize visual effect on scrolling list.

dateinput.heading: DateInput
dateinput.subheading: Date Input lets the user input a date

dropdown.heading: Dropdown
dropdown.subheading: A dropdown allows a user to select a value from a series of options.

rating.heading: Rating
rating.subheading: Ratings are used to collect measurable feedback from users. Use Rating over an Input where imagery can increase user interaction.

flag.heading: Flag
flag.subheading: A flag is is used to represent a political state.
